message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the use of echo state networks, which are a type of recurrent neural network, as universal approximators for input/output systems with fading memory. This falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of reservoir computing systems, which are a type of dynamical system used in machine learning, falling under the category of control systems (cs.SY) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper discusses the use of linear readout maps, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
